TextView.android:text: There are four subtests: Grasp, Grip, Pinch, Gross Movement. Items in each are ordered so that:
• If the subject passes the first,(scored a 3) no more need to be administered and he scores top marks for that subtest;
• If the subject fails the first and fails the second, he scores zero, and again no more tests need to be performed that subtest; All tests are timed with stopwatch
• otherwise he needs to complete all tasks within the subtest

3 = Performs test normally 
2 = Completes test, but takes abnormally long or has great difficulty 
1 = Performs test partially 
0 = Can perform no part of the test
1. Block 10cm\n(If score = 3 then total A = 18 and go to subset B.)
2. Block 2.5cm\n(If score = 0 then total A = 0 and go to subset B.)
1. Cup with water\n(If score = 3 then total B = 12 and go to subset C.)
2. Tube 2.5cm\n(If score = 0 then total B = 0 and go to subset C.)
1. Ball bearing, 6mm, 3rd (thumb ring-finger) (If score = 3 then total C = 18 and go to subset D.)
2. Marble, 1.5cm, (thumb to index finger)(If score = 0 then total C = 0 and go to subset D.)
1. Hand to back of head (If score = 3 then total D = 9; end test)
2. Hand to mouth (If score = 0 then total D = 0; end test)
